thread.title: Carol Stockton
thread.title_full: Woodland Direct reviewed by Carol Stockton

author: Carol Stockton
title: Carol Stockton
text: I am super excited to receive my new Wood Cook Stove at my new home in the mountains! It looks amazing! It seems like it will be wonderful to use for cooking, baking, warming food and warming my new mountain retreat center! Of course, safety is paramount and it seems like it meets all the specifications!
